item.title: Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: On The Effectiveness Of Bad Men More and more I feel that the people of ill will have used time much more effectively than have the people of good will. The Purpose Of Nonviolent Direct Action I must confess that I am not afraid of the word “tension.” I have earnestly opposed violent tension, but there is a type of constructive, nonviolent tension which is necessary for growth.
